name: Gauss Prime
description: Quicksilver takes form. Gauss Prime brooks no talk of defeat.

abilities.name: Mach Rush
abilities.description: Burst into a hyper-sprint bowling over enemies and charging the battery. Crashing into solid objects generates a powerful shockwave. Hold to rush continuously.

abilities.name: Kinetic Plating
abilities.description: Generate armor plating that converts a portion of absorbed Kinetic Damage (Physical, <DT_FIRE_COLOR>Heat, <DT_FREEZE_COLOR>Cold, and <DT_EXPLOSION_COLOR>Blast) into Energy. Also protects Gauss from being staggered or knocked down. Damage Resistance is relative to the battery level.

abilities.name: Thermal Sunder
abilities.description: Siphon kinetic energy from the area, charging the battery and inflicting <DT_FREEZE_COLOR>Cold Status on nearby enemies. Hold reverses the process, draining the battery and inflicting <DT_FIRE_COLOR>Heat Status on nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Redline
abilities.description: Push Gauss' battery beyond the redline, supercharging his Abilities and setting Fire Rate, Attack Speed, Reload Speed, and Casting Speed into overdrive. When past the redline, bolts of arcing electricity dance periodically from Gauss, exploding en masse when the ability is deactivated.

languages.description: Quecksilber nimmt Gestalt an. Gauss Prime duldet keine Rede von einer Niederlage.
languages.name: Gauss Prime

languages.description: Le vif-argent prend forme. Gauss Prime ne tolère aucune allusion à la défaite.
languages.name: Gauss Prime

languages.description: L'argento vivo prende forma. Gauss Prime non tollera alcun accenno alla sconfitta.
languages.name: Gauss Prime

languages.description: 형태를 갖춘 초고속의 수은. 가우스 프라임은 '패배'라는 단어 하나조차도 용납하지 않습니다.
languages.name: 가우스 프라임

languages.description: La velocidad toma forma. Gauss Prime no admite la derrota.
languages.name: Gauss Prime

languages.description: 以水银打造的外型。Gauss Prime 不容失败。
languages.name: Gauss Prime

languages.description: Ртуть, принявшая форму. Гаусс Прайм не терпит разговоров о поражении.
languages.name: Гаусс Прайм

languages.description: 神速の化身。敗北など、知らない。
languages.name: Gauss Prime

languages.description: Żywe srebro nabiera formy. Gauss Prime nie toleruje rozmowy o porażce.
languages.name: Gauss Prime

languages.description: A personificação da velocidade. O Gauss Prime não admite derrotas.
languages.name: Gauss Prime

languages.description: 速銀成形。對 Gauss Prime 來說勝利本就不在話下。
languages.name: Gauss Prime

languages.description: ก่อรูปขึ้นมาจากสารเคลือบปรอท Gauss Prime จะไม่ยอมทนต่อความพ่ายแพ้
languages.name: Gauss Prime

languages.description: Hızın şekil almış hali. Gauss Prime yenilgiden bahsetmeye bile tahammül edemez.
languages.name: Gauss Prime

languages.description: Ртуть набуває форми. Ґаусс-прайм не хоче навіть чути про поразку.
languages.name: Ґаусс-прайм
